summary.span: 提供 对象的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型转换器 为除之外的所有目标类型调用基方法 ，其中空字符串 ( "" ) 。This type converter calls the base method for all destination types except , for which an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#1)]

param.name: context

span.span: An that indicates the component or control to which the data binding collection belongs.

param.name: culture
param.span: ，它可以用于提供附加的区域性信息。

span.span: A that can be used to provide additional culture information.

summary.span: 将数据绑定集合转换为指定的类型。

span.span: Converts a data binding collection to the specified type.

returns.span: 通过类型转换产生的对象。

span.span: The object produced by the type conversion.

returns.span: 如果 参数为 类型，则该方法返回一个空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If the parameter is of type , this method returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `destinationType` 参数的类型为，则此方法返回一个空字符串 。This method returns an empty string if the `destinationType` parameter is of type . 否则，此方法将调用 基类的方法 。Otherwise this method calls the method of the base class.
